mdRecord.dcterms:title: Winchester / compliments of The Equity Improvement Company of Winchester, Virginia .. ; compiled by J. Howard Gore, B.S., Ph. D., of the Columbian University
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Gore, James Howard, 1856-1939 [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Title from the face of the map, which has "Winchester" printed across the street grid. [original]
Judge John Handley, listed as President of the Company, died in 1895. [original]
Shows street grid of downtown Winchester, with local railroad lines, major roads, various building lots, manufacturing sites and factory sites. [original]
Oriented with north to the upper left. [original]
Note: This company, organized for the development of the industries and natural resources of Winchester, Va., and its immediate vicinity, has building and factory sites for sale ... [original]
Inset: Chart of distances from Winchester, Va. [showing major cities within a 250 mile radius] [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Equity Improvement Company (Winchester, Va.)
